content.title: Babu Jagjivan Ram Chhatrawas Yojna
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: This scheme for the construction of hostels is one of the means to enable and encourage students belonging to Scheduled Castes (SC) to attain quality education. Such hostels are immensely beneficial to the students hailing from rural and remote areas of the country. While the scheme of construction of hostels for SC girls is in operation from the Third Five Year Plan (1961-66), the same for boys was started with effect from the year 1989-90.
benefits: 50% central assistance for boys' hostels on a matching share basis
eligibility: Priority to areas with a concentration of SC population of 15% and more
Preference for integrated hostels over stand-alone hostels
Priority to top-performing Government schools without hostels
Hostels for girls located in areas with low SC female literacy
Focus on middle and higher secondary levels of education
documents_required: Utilization Certificate as per format mentioned in the sanction letter
Audit reports since 1st installment was released
Balance sheet since the 1st installment released
Income expenditure statement since the 1st installment released
Receipt of payment since the 1st installment released
Bank Statement since the release of 1st installment
Details of interest earned on 1st installment released for the project
Status of the utilization of matching share by the implementing agency, if any
Colour Photographs of the project site
